definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: This air line operates five main lines and twenty branch lines.
sentences.chinese: 这家航空公司经营五条主干线和二十条支线。

sentences.english: This airline operates five main lines and dozens of branch lines.
sentences.chinese: 这家航空公司经营五条主干线和十几条支线。

sentences.english: This air line operates five main lines and twenty branch lines .
sentences.chinese: 这家航空企业经营五条主干线和二十条支线。

definition: branch line/side road/spur/fig. secondary plot (in a story)
multiple track (e.g. rail)/multi-lane (e.g. highway)/the complex line (math.)
along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
lit. warp string in weaving/fig. vertical or north-south lines/to pass through/to cross lengthwise/to pierce (esp. north-south or top-to-bottom)
